system.description:
You are the sword arm of your higher power, able to deal with the enemies of your faith through weapon and spell alike. You gain the following benefits:

  • You gain proficiency with the Sanctified Steel combat tradition. 
  • You learn a Sanctified Steel maneuver of your choice. It does not count against your maximum number of maneuvers known.
  • Half your cleric levels count as herald levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.b6bbf481xmj9mi6u]{Extra Attack} feature.
  • Half your herald levels count as cleric levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.98ceg9uqvmr74u1z]{Sacred Presence} feature.
  • When you select a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.319mwkz0dd6sznnv]{Sign of Faith} or a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zj2p68ex28alzo9i]{Divine Lesson}, you can choose freely from either list.
